title: Chesapeake Shores - Pilot
synopsis: Abby (Meghan Ory) takes her twin daughters from New York back to her hometown in Maryland at the request of her sister Jess (Laci J. Mailey), where she clashes with her father Mick (Treat Williams) and runs into her high school sweetheart, Trace (Jesse Metcalfe).

title: Home to Roost - Part 1
synopsis: With the five O'Brien kids back at home for the first time in ages, Abby (Meghan Ory) considers giving up her Wall Street career, while her former flame Trace (Jesse Metcalfe) is reluctant to share why he is also back in Chesapeake Shores.

title: Home to Roost - Part 2
synopsis: After Abby (Meghan Ory) decides to permanently stay in Chesapeake Shores, she gets into a heated argument with her ex-husband Wes (Michael Karl Richards) about the custody of their twin girls.

title: We're Not Losing a Son...
synopsis: Abby (Meghan Ory) adjusts to her job in a new office, but she's struggling with the idea of just being friends with Trace (Jesse Metcalfe) in Chesapeake Shores, while Kevin (Brendan Penny) reports back that he intends for his current deployment to be his last.

title: We're Gaining a Daughter
synopsis: Mick (Treat Williams) and Nell (Diane Ladd) nervously await news about the disappearance of Kevin (Brendan Penny), and Abby (Meghan Ory) must leave Chesapeake Shores and return to New York to face her ex Wes (Michael Karl Richards) in court.

title: Georgia on My Mind
synopsis: The O'Briens are surprised by the sudden arrival in Chesapeake Shores of Georgia (Ali Liebert), who claims to be engaged to Kevin (Brendan Penny), while Abby (Meghan Ory) deals with a fraud investigation and Trace (Jesse Metcalfe) has a financial dispute with his father.

title: Second Chances
synopsis: Abby (Meghan Ory) uncovers the shocking truth behind her fraud investigation, and when she turns to Trace (Jesse Metcalfe) for help, he finally confides in her the reason he abandoned his music career in Nashville and returned to Chesapeake Shores.

title: Deals Undone
synopsis: Trace (Jesse Metcalfe) had plans to turn an empty warehouse in Chesapeake Shores into a music venue, but learns that Mick (Treat Williams) already bought the property, and Abby (Meghan Ory) is served a subpoena in the investigation into her ex-husband.

title: Exes Mark the Spot
synopsis: Abby (Meghan Ory) and Trace (Jesse Metcalfe) are finally moving towards a real relationship, but an emergency phone call puts it all in jeopardy, while elsewhere in Chesapeake Shores, Jess (Laci J Mailey) tries to sort out both her love life and the trauma she has been repressing.

title: Secrets, Lies, and School Supplies
synopsis: As Abby (Meghan Ory) and the rest of the O'Briens prepare for Chesapeake Shore's annual lantern festival, Trace (Jesse Metcalfe) must return to Nashville to face a mistake from his past.

title: Pasts and Presents
synopsis: Mick (Treat Williams) makes some unpopular decisions when he plans to sell the nightclub that he and Trace (Jesse Metcalfe) had built together in Chesapeake Shores, while Jess (Lacy J Mailey) turns to an unexpected source for help with planning her cousin's wedding.

title: Photographs and Memories
synopsis: As Abby (Meghan Ory) sends her girls off to their first day at a new school in Chesapeake Shores, conflict arises between Trace (Jesse Metcalfe) and Wes (Michael Karl Richards) about their roles in the family.

title: It's Always Nashville
synopsis: Trace (Jesse Metcalfe) departs Chesapeake Shores and hits the road to record an album with his ex-girlfriend, Leigh (Brittany Willacy), but he has trouble channeling creative inspiration while he is away from Abby (Meghan Ory).

title: Buried Treasures
synopsis: Nell (Diane Ladd) discovers a treasure map that Bree (Emilie Ullerup) made as a teen, leading Bree and Kevin (Brendan Penny) to hunt for a family time capsule in the backyard; while Abby (Meghan Ory) meets a handsome widower in the Chesapeake Shores PTA.

title: Grand Openings
synopsis: As the nightclub opening nears, Trace (Jesse Metcalfe) spends late nights practicing with Leigh (Brittany Willacy) and his band, while Mick (Treat Williams) fights the Chesapeake Shores city hall to receive a live music permit.

title: Signed, Sealed, Delivered: The Movie
synopsis: Shane McInerney (Kristin Booth) joins the Dead Letter Office of the U.S. Postal Service, where dedicated leader Oliver O'Toole (Eric Mabius) and his team work to reunite a young couple who spent one day together and then were kept apart by tragic circumstances.

title: Time to Start Livin'
synopsis: As the team in the Dead Letter Office welcomes a new supervisor (Valerie Harper), they work to track down a little boy who sent a letter to "Gramma" saying that he is planning on running away from home, only to find a much more dangerous situation than they could have suspected.

title: To Whom It May Concern
synopsis: On their annual "Impossibly Ripped and Mangled Day," the postal detectives find a torn up note from a young woman named Samila who wrote that she is searching for "the man who saved my life and changed it forever."

title: Soulmates
synopsis: The office's new supervisor, Cora Brandt (Della Reese), institutes a new rule saying that any letter that can't be returned in a day must be destroyed, putting extra pressure on them to reconnect a cowboy with his long-lost sweetheart.

title: The Masterpiece
synopsis: While Shane and Oliver disagree over their upcoming dance recital, Norman discovers a battered package from a young man hoping to reconnect with his estranged father, but this is one reunion they will not be able to make happen.

title: The Edge of Forever
synopsis: While Oliver and Shane struggle over their feelings, the team attempts to deliver an urn full of ashes to a pair of bickering sisters, and help the two reconnect with each other in a "treasure hunt" to fulfill their late mother's final request.

title: The Future Me
synopsis: As Rita competes for the title of Miss Special Delivery against the daughter of new supervisor Glynis Rucker (Marilu Henner), the department looks to track down the sender of a tattered letter that was found in a school desk.

title: Something Good
synopsis: The department uncovers a CD with a love song, and they look to connect the famous female singer on the track with the unknown male vocalist who wrote the tune, but in the process, Shane lets her feelings about Oliver slip out.

title: Dark of Night
synopsis: The team recover a 10-year-old letter from a woman painfully admitting to her husband that he is not the biological father of their daughter, and when they track down the man, they learn they will have to reveal some tragic secrets to save the daughter's life.

title: The Treasure Box
synopsis: Inside a lost package is a puzzle box containing a key to a safe deposit box, but when Oliver and Shane go to check out the contents, they set off the bank's security system, locking them in an air-tight vault without enough oxygen to make it through the night.

title: A Hope and a Future
synopsis: The Postables find a letter from a woman who had to give up her infant son because he had a medical condition, so while they look to reconnect the now-grown man with his mother, Norman decides to finally meet his biological grandmother, Ardis (Carol Burnett).

title: Sue Thomas: F.B.Eye
synopsis: Sue Thomas (Deanne Bray) is a somewhat sheltered young deaf woman who has recently graduated from college and is about to start her first real job which happens to be with the F.B.I.

title: Bombs Away
synopsis: Sue's first FBI assignment thrusts her into the high stakes, high-pressure world of investigating an anonymous bomb threat at an oil refinery.

title: Assassins
synopsis: Sue is swept into the maelstrom of a dangerous assignment when the FBI has to protect a visiting dignitary who has been targeted for assassination by a terrorist cell.

title: A Snitch In Time
synopsis: Sue cultivates her first informant who just might lead her from a small time smuggling case to a big time highway robbery ring, if she can discern when to trust him.

title: The Signing
synopsis: Sue is called upon to use her skills with American sign language when questioning Troy, an arrogant, uncooperative, deaf suspect in a car theft ring.

title: A Blast From the Past
synopsis: Dimitrius faces a crisis point in his marriage and his career when he and his family are stalked by a recently released armed-robber intent on revenge.

title: Silent Night
synopsis: Sue's parents come to visit for the holidays, while Sue Jack and the gang investigate a series of bank robberies that are committed by Santa Claus?

title: Greed
synopsis: When Sue uncovers corruption at a powerful corporation, she persuades a frightened employee to work with the FBI in making their case, but they find their careers and their lives in danger.

title: Diplomatic Immunity
synopsis: Bobby rescues a woman from a vicious attack but his noble action threatens to end his career when the attacker turns out to be a Sudanese diplomat.

title: Dirty Bomb
synopsis: Sue and the team receive information a dirty bomb has been smuggled into the country.

title: The Heist
synopsis: When an armored truck disappears into thin air, Jack and the other agents must track down the missing 2.4 million dollars -- and the missing security guards.

title: The Leak
synopsis: What looks like a routine SWAT takedown of a terrorism suspect turns into a potentially deadly ambush, so Sue leads the charge to uncover the information leak that compromised the raid.

title: Missing
synopsis: The team's favorite waitress seems to be involved in software piracey and has been using Tara's business card in the process. Myles is then being considered a candidate for the new face of the FBI.

title: Prodigal Father
synopsis: Trying to catch a long wanted criminal, the team uses a jail bound con man to capture him. The informant turns out to be Bobby's father, which Bobby unhappy.

title: He Said She Said
synopsis: Sue and Myles are assigned to a special task force to take down a South American drug group. Sue is then blamed for the death of an FBI agent, and the team tries to remove the blame, with some help from Troy and Charlie.

title: The Hunter
synopsis: When it seems as if an innocent man is convicted of being a serial killer many years ago, the FBI starts a new search for evidence of a recent killing that resembles that of the old murderer. Jack stands trial for killing and traumatizing chickens.

title: The Fugitive
synopsis: While Sue reluctantly attends a wedding of an old friend of hers, the team is on a lookout for a prisoner soon to be released, who may be going after his wife that helped put him away.

title: Billy the Kid
synopsis: Lucy's mom announces that she is engaged, while the team looks into the attempted murder of a judge, who is a friend of Jack's, by a young man, Billy, who also a friend of Jack's. The episode includes a brief guest appearance by the real Sue Thomas, in the final couple of minutes.

title: The Girl Who Signed Wolf
synopsis: Disbelief runs through the F.B.I. office when a young deaf girl claims to have witnessed a kidnapping and an author comes to interview Myles.

title: The Sniper
synopsis: Three random people are all shot by the same man. With so little evidence to go on, the team is stretched to the limit forcing Jack to take drastic actions in order to catch the sniper, actions that could put his life in danger.

title: Homeland Security
synopsis: As Myles cracks down on a case of art forgery, the rest of the team investigates a bomb threat. Sue becomes worried when Charlie begins to forget certain things.

title: Cold Case
synopsis: Sue and Lucy dig up an old case concerning a young bank teller who was shot. However, with so little evidence, the girls find it hard to make any progress. In the meantime, the boys film their online videos for an upcoming bachelor auction.

title: The Newlywed Game
synopsis: When the F.B.I notice some unusual phone calls between possible terrorists and D.C citizens, they decide to do some surveillance. In order to remain inconspicuous, Sue and Jack pose as a newly married couple and move into the house next door to the suspects.

title: Breaking Up Is Hard to Do
synopsis: The team continues their investigation believing that the suspects intend to spread the bubonic plague. With Betty as their only hope of catching the criminals, the team races against time to stop them in their tracks.

title: Bad Hair Day
synopsis: When Tara shoots a robber in a hair salon, her security is tested by family of the deceased. Sue and Lucy take care of an owner-less dog they found at the park.

title: Political Agenda
synopsis: When the team starts an investigation concerning the homicide of a young woman, they get a confession quickly. But it soon becomes clear that their confessor is not the criminal.

title: The Gambler
synopsis: In order to catch a long wanted criminal, Bobby gets back into his old gambling habits, with dangerous consequences. Levi starts acting up and eventually goes missing.

title: Into Thin Air
synopsis: Sue is assigned a missing persons case when a 19-year old deaf college student disappears. Myles is determined to secure an overseas assignment, believing it has connections with the CIA.

title: To Grandmother's House We Go
synopsis: While Lucy's grandmother is on the verge of becoming homeless due to a contract fraud, a bank robbery has the FBI team's attention divided.

title: The Lawyer
synopsis: Jack finds himself face to face with a civil rights lawyer after being accused of denying a potential terrorist their rights.

title: The Holocaust Survivor
synopsis: When an acquaintance of Sue's sees who she thinks was a concentration camp guard in World War II, Sue begins to investigate, looking for the man with little evidence to go on. Meanwhile, Myles, Bobby, and Dimitrius battle against Randy over travel expenses.

title: The Mentor
synopsis: Sue meets Jack and Bobby's FBI Mentor when he brings the team in on a case to sting a North Korean terror group - but Sue discovers that things are not as they seem. Meanwhile, Lucy reconnects with her old high school love - with surprising results.

title: Rocket Man
synopsis: Sue and Dimitrius put an operative in the field to take down an illegal arms sale - but when the encounter gives them a chance to land an even bigger fish, Dimitrius goes undercover as the bait. Meanwhile, Dimitrius wife Donna has some unexpected news of her own.

title: Elvis Is in the Building
synopsis: Sue and the team must infiltrate a Chinese drug-smuggling ring, requiring Bobby to go undercover at the gang leader's nightclub - as an Elvis impersonator. And Sue learns that her friend Troy has an estranged brother - and that the estranged brother has a secret.

title: Hit and Run
synopsis: When the members of a think tank are found shot dead, Sue and the team track down the sole survivor - but is he a possible future victim or the murderer? By accident, Sue ends up in the fleeing man's car. And Sue teaches Levi some new tricks - or maybe he's teaching her.

title: Concrete Evidence
synopsis: Investigating a 5-year old murder, the team automatically links the killing to a group of drug dealers, but further investigating draws them towards another killing that occurred just months before the first. Meanwhile, Myles attempts to improve his neighborly relations.

title: The Kiss
synopsis: In order to solve a case involving two men shot with the same gun, Sue and Jack go undercover to the law firm that the two men both worked at. With Myles' sister also working at the law firm the agents get deeper and deeper into the facts of the case.

title: Adventures in Babysitting
synopsis: When Sue's snitch Howie witnesses a murder, Sue and Jack go undercover to investigate a possible mob connection.

title: The Body Shop
synopsis: When Sue and the team discover a cache of illegal visas, they track the makers to the black market -- only to make a disturbing discovery as to what's really for sale.

title: Skin Deep
synopsis: Sue and the team get word about an upcoming act of eco-terrorism, and in order to prevent it, they find themselves working with an "email mole."

title: The New Mafia
synopsis: Sue goes undercover with Tony, a visiting FBI agent, to infiltrate a mafia family, but Jack becomes concerned because Tony doesn't always play by the rules.

title: The Actor
synopsis: As the team is "shadowed" by an actor preparing for his role as an FBI agent, Sue and Jack work with informant Howie to stop a shipment of guns from reaching its final destination.

title: Planes, Trains, and Automobiles
synopsis: Sue and the team track down a missing 727 airplane and three stolen gasoline tankers in a race against the clock to stop an impending terrorist strike.

title: Simon Says
synopsis: When the team tracks a serial murderer whose victims are powerful and successful women, Sue finds herself matching wits with the killer in a twisted game of "Simon Says."

title: Did She or Didn't She
synopsis: Sue reconnects with a deaf woman who is an up-and-coming sculptor, but when the woman becomes a murder suspect, Sue must determine if she really committed the crime.

title: The Fraternity
synopsis: Sue investigates the death of a prominent Senator's son during a fraternity hazing, but what appears to be a clear case of alcohol poisoning takes a surprising turn.

title: Secret Agent Man
synopsis: When a mysterious photo memory stick is delivered to the FBI, Sue and the team must unravel its secrets, leading them on a twisty path to a mysterious stranger.

title: Spy Games
synopsis: Sue becomes the only link between the FBI team and a rogue British agent with amnesia - but is the agent remembering more than he's letting on?

title: Boy Meets World
synopsis: When Sue, Jack and the team investigate a bomb explosion at a restaurant, they discover the only survivor -- and witness -- is a twelve-year-old boy.

title: False Profit
synopsis: Sue and Jack investigate the kidnapping of a young woman, but when they track down the kidnapper, they find themselves pursuing a more dangerous case.

title: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire
synopsis: When a drug-laden plane crashes outside of D.C., Sue and the team must track down the drug smugglers -- but has someone already beaten them to the evidence?

title: The Bounty Hunter
synopsis: When Sue and the team search for the source of a new designer drug, they cross paths with a win-at-all-costs bounty hunter who has a score to settle with Jack.

title: Troy Story
synopsis: Sue is shocked to discover her friend Troy has been arrested for armed robbery -- a crime he swears he didn't commit, while Bobby's girlfriend considers a move to Los Angeles.

title: Mind Games
synopsis: Sue and the team are approached by a woman who claims she's witnessed a murder, but the case is turned on its head when they discover the eyewitness has a disturbing secret of her own.

title: Bad Girls
synopsis: While investigating a bank robbery, Sue and the team discover it was robbed five years ago, and the clue trail leads them to a surprising twist.

title: Endings and Beginnings
synopsis: Sue is offered an exciting new high-profile job at the FBI, but she is torn when she realizes it means leaving behind her teammates and friends, including 12-year-old Amanda.

title: Heartland: Series Premiere
synopsis: Marion Fleming and her daughter, Amy, head out to rescue a horse named Spartan, when the unthinkable happens and Marion loses her life. Amy and her sister, Lou, and their grandpa, Jack, need to come together to save Heartland, the family ranch, aid the wild horse Marion tried to rescue, and discover who else Marion was trying to help.

title: After the Storm
synopsis: As the Fleming sisters begin to heal, they receive a request to help a horse overcome its fear of traffic. After work has begun with the horse, Lou releases it back to its owner before it's completely cured causing another rift in the family and damaging the ranch's reputation. And Ty, the ranch hand with the criminal record, is asked to stay on at Heartland.

title: Breaking Free
synopsis: In an attempt to bring in new business, Lou plans an open house at Heartland even as Amy has added some high-profile clients to their roster. And the ranch has been asked to help Promise, a horse that won't let anyone near her with a saddle. Meanwhile, Val Stanton from Green Briar, a rival ranch, challenges Amy to train a difficult jumping horse.

title: Taking Chances
synopsis: Impressed by the work the family does at Heartland, their high-profile client, Lisa Stillman, sends her nephew, Ben, to the ranch to learn about horses and about himself. While cleaning out their mom's old room for the boy, Lou and Amy find a letter their estranged father wrote, asking their mother for a second chance.

title: The Best Laid Plans
synopsis: Lou is determined to create a video to promote Heartland and bring in more clients, but no one on the ranch is supportive of the idea. When the director Lou hired from the city drops out of the project, she finds a replacement but continues to pull all the strings. The shoot goes from bad to worse when the camera spooks a pony that almost tramples Amy.

title: One Trick Pony
synopsis: When Lou's boyfriend from New York, Carl, comes to Heartland for a visit, he ends up rubbing just about everyone the wrong way. But he's been offered a great new job in Chicago and wants Lou to come with him. Then Amy and Mallory discover that Scott is secretly in love with Lou and hoping, along with everyone else, that Carl will just go away.

title: Come What May
synopsis: When Jack agrees to stable a pregnant mare named Melody at Heartland for a neighboring rancher, Lou isn't happy about the decision. Then Jack takes Ty on a cattle round up and discovers the trail boss is Tim Fleming, Lou and Amy's estranged father. And when Ben leaves for a horse show, the girls are left alone at the ranch when Melody begins to deliver her foal.

title: Out of the Darkness
synopsis: A famous race horse named Gallant Prince has been sent to Heartland to see if it can be rehabilitated after a terrible fire. The horse was seriously injured and the physical scars have healed, but the mental ones remain. Amy has been having a difficult time reaching the horse when Lou makes the mistake of talking to a reporter and soon all eyes are on Amy's abilities.

title: Ghost from the Past
synopsis: When an eccentric neighbor is rushed to the hospital in a fight for her life, her Shetland pony, Sugarfoot, is left behind. Amy brings the heartbroken horse to the ranch. The pony is not responding to Amy's attempts to help her heal, until Lou approaches and the horse seems to remember her from rides when they were both young.

title: Born to Run
synopsis: Famous horseman, Nick Harwell, comes to Heartland to give Ben some pointers, but Ben reacts badly when Nick tells him he may have a problem. Ty has a run-in with a cruel wrangler on a mustang roundup and reveals a glimpse into his violent past. And when Mallory overhears Lou discussing a horse for a young rider, she fears she will lose her beloved Copper.

title: Thicker than Water
synopsis: The Fleming girls finally agree to have lunch with their estranged father at Heartland, and Lou is hurt by the easy way Amy and Tim can discuss horses. When the three head out with the horses, Lou surprises Amy by revealing that she was an accomplished rider as a girl. And Jack and Lisa Stillman head off on a fly fishing trip to see where their relationship is going.

title: Rising from the Ashes
synopsis: Scott asks Lou to a black tie event on the same evening Ty accompanies Amy to the high school semi-formal leaving Jack alone at Heartland. When a fire breaks out in the barn, Jack is the only person around to get the horses to safety but he's seriously injured during the rescue. Scott and Ty work with Tim Fleming to try to find the suspected arsonist.

title: Coming Together
synopsis: In this season finale episode, Amy is getting ready to ride Spartan in the Fall Finale, but she's competing against her rival, Ashley, from Heartland's rival ranch, Green Briar. And she finds out that Spartan's previous owner wants to get him back. Meanwhile, Lou is considering a job offer that would take her back to New York. And Ty's probation is complete, so he's free to leave the ranch.

title: Ghost Horse
synopsis: Since Ty left Heartland to reconnect with his father, Amy has started working with new stable hand, Caleb Odell. She's discovered a wounded, white mustang hanging around the ranch and is determined to rescue the wild horse. And with Amy's sixteenth birthday approaching, Lou is taking time away from developing an Equine Executive Retreat to plan a surprise party.

title: Letting Go
synopsis: Now that Ty has returned to the ranch, he's discovering that things have changed. His job and his routine with Amy have been taken by Caleb, Lou and Tim are trying to turn Heartland into an Equine Retreat, and Amy seems to have lost her touch with a wild mustang. But Ty recognizes that the horse seems to have a friend out in the wild.

title: Gift Horse
synopsis: Amy receives a gorgeous jumping horse from Tim for her birthday and she needs to make the difficult decision between training for a career in show jumping and following her heart at Heartland. The challenging training schedule required to compete at a high level starts to take its toll and her school work begins to suffer.

title: Dancing in the Dark
synopsis: When Amy, Tim and the gang from Heartland plan on attending a weekend cattle drive, Lou works to get Scott alone at the ranch, but the first of her guests for the Equine Retreat show up a week early. And Tim learns that the woman who just inherited the ranch where he's been working, Big River Ranch, plans on selling it now that her father has died.

title: Corporate Cowgirls
synopsis: When her past colleagues from New York arrive for an Equine Retreat, Lou is forced to face her decision to stay at Heartland and rebuild her family's business rather than return to her career in the city. To prove her worth to herself more than her friends, Lou struggles to maintain the peace between Jack and Tim as they lead an overnight trail ride for the guests.

title: Holding Fast
synopsis: Out for a ride, Amy comes across a police officer trying to rescue a boy from drowning in the river, and she tries to settle Venture, Constable Mark Rodriguez's panicked horse. Soon after the officer brings Venture to Heartland to see if Amy can help the horse overcome a new fear of water. Meanwhile after Scott gets a job with the polo team, he's worried he only got it because of Lou's relationship with the team captain.

title: Sweetheart of the Rodeo
synopsis: It's time for the annual Hudson Heritage Rodeo and everyone at Heartland is getting in on the action. Amy decides to try her hand at the team roping events with Caleb, but he backs out when Tim starts tossing around advice. And Jack and Tim are forced to find a way to work together when they both end up on the planning committee.

title: Summer's End
synopsis: Summer is coming to a close but the heat has become nearly unbearable again when a cattle truck rolls into Heartland. Inside, Scott and the hands find a load of sick and thirsty horses, and the driver turns out to be Ty's father. Lou calls the police, but when they're unable to do anything she tries to buy the horses. And Amy calls Ashley Stanton when she recognizes Apollo, Ashley's old horse.

title: Showdown!
synopsis: Cattle rustlers are in the area and everyone is on alert to keep their land and their cattle safe.

title: True Enough
synopsis: While Tim recuperates from a gunshot wound he suffered while trying to protect Amy, he drives everyone at Heartland crazy. And when Callie comes to see him, she discovers he hasn't told anyone on the ranch about their relationship. Meanwhile, Ty convinces Amy to talk with Caleb who's avoiding his chores while feeling responsible for Tim's injuries.

title: Starstruck!
synopsis: When a young Hollywood star shows up at Heartland to improve her riding skills for an upcoming role, everyone is excited to welcome her. But she asks that everyone on the ranch sign a confidentiality agreement to keep the paparazzi from tracking her down. And Mallory has escaped from her new school, and she's having the hardest time of all keeping the actress's secret.

title: Divorce Horse
synopsis: Lou's friend from New York, Mackenzie, comes back to Heartland to get married. She wants a simple ceremony and Lou is doing everything she can to put together the perfect wedding. And Lisa has just shown up with an Andalusian named Diva Girl who's been returned by several owners who claimed she was the cause of their divorces.

title: Seismic Shifts
synopsis: A big oil company seems to be blasting near Heartland and it's upsetting everyone on the ranch except two guests who are spending a lot of time fishing. But when Lou discovers the guests are the very prospectors who are conducting the seismic tests, she kicks them out and works to mobilize the community against Big Alberta Oil.

title: Do or Die
synopsis: Hoping to let Heartland work its magic on two of his most difficult cases, Ty's former probation officer, Clint, is back. He's planning a weekend of teambuilding and discipline for Tara and Badger, but everything changes when Clint suddenly has a mysterious allergic reaction on the ranch and leaves Lou in charge of the young pair.

title: Dark Horse
synopsis: Kit thinks of Ty first when she discovers she needs help finding the perfect new home for a horse she was given. Amy agrees to help Caleb with a team roping competition, but then changes her mind when she realizes how much time she'll have to spend with Ty and Kit. And Lou resurrects the Hudson Derby which reopens a rift between Jack and Tim.

title: The Ties That Bind
synopsis: Spartan, the horse that Amy saved on her last rescue mission with her mom, has been stolen. She's determined to locate him and bring him home when Ty spots him at a horse auction, but the auctioneers gavel comes down before Ty can do anything. And without a bill of sale proving Spartan is hers, Amy may also be helpless to do anything.

title: Full Circle
synopsis: Now that Spartan has been returned after being kidnapped, Amy discovers that he won't jump any longer. So she takes him to her mom's old friend, a First Nations healer named Victor Whitetail, a healer who works with horse and helps mend broken hearts. And Peter books the entire dude ranch to get time alone with Lou.

title: Step by Step
synopsis: When Amy and Ty head into the frozen countryside to save a herd of wild horses from starving, a snowstorm strands them at Jack's fishing cabin forcing them to come to terms with their feelings for each other. And after Lou and Peter discover the highway to their spa vacation is closed, they come back to Heartland and Lou admits her hidden relationship to Jack.

title: Miracle
synopsis: This season starts off with a traffic accident that involves Amy's school bus and a trailer full of horses. Amy hops off the bus to help a gelding that's stuck in a fence, and some bystanders record the rescue. When the video is released to the local news, Heartland and Amy are thrust into the limelight. But Amy struggles to heal the horse and live up to the hype.

title: Little Secrets
synopsis: Due to all the notoriety Amy received after rescuing a horse that was injured during a traffic accident, she has more projects than she can handle. But Lou has squeezed an extra appointment into her schedule. A young girl and her horse need to get back on their feet after what appeared to be a freak accident, and they need to figure out how to heal the girl's entire family.

title: Man's Best Friend
synopsis: Jack's truck is old, rusty and on its last legs, and Lisa has been trying to talk him into getting a new one, but she reaches her limit when the truck breaks down on the way to a wedding. But is Jack really ready to say goodbye to this old part of his life? Meanwhile, Amy and Ty are preparing to attend her school dance, but she doesn't think he wants to go with her.

title: The Haunting of Hanley Barn
synopsis: In this Halloween episode, Mr. Hanley, one of Heartland's neighbors, has asked for Amy's help to figure out what's been spooking the horses in his barn. So she and Ty decide to spend a frightful night there to discover what's upsetting the animals. And Badger makes a return to the ranch only to discover he has feelings for Mallory.

title: Glory Days
synopsis: Former rodeo champion, Tim, takes a walk down memory lane as he agrees to give Caleb lessons in the art of bulldogging, but Tim's best days at the rodeo may be behind him. And Ty is trying to make decisions about his future when Scott asks him to come to the Bailey ranch to assist with Kit's pregnant mare, leaving Amy a little jealous.

title: Growing Pains
synopsis: When Kit's mare rejects her new foal, Merlin, Scott asks Ty and Amy to team up and look after the little orphan to keep it safe, but learning to parent a newborn puts a strain on their relationship.

title: The Starting Gate
synopsis: Amy claims she's too busy with all her projects at Heartland to help Lisa with one of her racehorses, but Lisa thinks it's suspicious when Amy suddenly finds time to give Tim a hand with a horse that originally came from Lisa's stable and won't enter the starting gate. And the two horses are scheduled to go up against each other at the track.

title: The Fix
synopsis: When Tim is ready to enter the racehorse he bought from Lisa Stillman in a local race, he wants someone to keep an eye on the horse when he's not at the track, so he hires Ty. But Ty becomes distracted at home by a surprise visit from his mom, Lily, and even more distracted at the track when his abusive stepfather, Wade, shows up.

title: Broken Arrow
synopsis: It's time for Ty to head off to vet school, and Amy wants to spend his last day at Heartland together. But he offers to catch a flight with Scott to rescue an injured horse in British Columbia. Scott knows there's a surprise party planned for Ty, so he has to get them back to the ranch in time. But when Amy goes to the airport to meet the flight, she discovers that contact with the plane was lost.

title: Eye of the Wolf
synopsis: A plane crash has stranded Ty and Scott in the wilderness with injuries and very little survival gear, and everyone at Heartland is worried sick. Feeling helpless, Amy begins to organize a search on horseback to rescue the men. And Ty struggles to keep Scott safe and alive while trying to contact the rescue team and avoid the wolf that howls every night.

title: Catch and Release
synopsis: Ty has been having a hard time sleeping since the recent plane accident and has begun suffering from nightmares, so Jack and Tim decide to take him and Lou's boyfriend on a fishing trip. Meanwhile, as Lou prepares for a magazine photographer to come to Heartland, the ranch is plagued by visits from a dog, a porcupine and a herd of escaped cows.

title: The Reckoning
synopsis: As the second anniversary of the death of Lou and Amy's mom approaches, Victor Whitetail visits Heartland to pay his respects to the family, and Tim begins to wonder if Victor's relationship with Marion was more than just a friendship. And Ty convinces Kit to let Amy help a star barrel horse overcome the anguish of a lost foal.

title: Quarantine
synopsis: As Amy works to help Kit's barrel racing horse, Daisy, overcome the loss of her foal, Daisy comes down with a case of Strangles and Heartland is placed under quarantine. And Amy becomes furious when she discovers that Kit brought Daisy to the ranch right after a rodeo where other horses had already contracted Strangles, and now the entire stable has been put in danger.

title: The Happy List
synopsis: Val Stanton has finally been given a clean bill of health by her doctor, so she asks Amy to help her get back in the saddle and brush up on her show jumping skills.

title: Second Chances
synopsis: When Amy and Ty discover Mr. Hanley's horses wandering by the side of the road, they round up the animals and return them to their home, but it appears to be abandoned. And it turns out Mr. Hanley is about to lose the farm. Meanwhile, Lou has met a lawyer named Caroline Hanley at a local business women's group. Can Lou convince Caroline to help her brother save the ranch?

title: Spin Out!
synopsis: Caleb knows he needs to fix body and soul after his accident, but he keeps pushing everyone away. So Amy tries to get him back up on his horse to try to help heal the scars. And Lisa wants to tell Lou and Amy that she and Jack are engaged, but Jack is reluctant to take any of the limelight off of Lou and Peter's wedding plans.

title: Ring of Fire
synopsis: In an effort to drum up publicity for Heartland, Lou and Tim convince Amy to enter a professional colt starting competition. Once she makes the decision to follow in her mother's footsteps, Amy realizes that her gift with horses and her personal confidence are going to be tested by the challenge. Meanwhile, Mallory is interested in joining her school's riding club.

title: In the Cards
synopsis: As Lou plans for her wedding to Peter, he surprises her with an announcement that he has to move to Dubai and wants to get married before the move, while Lisa tries to be careful not to interfere in the wedding planning. And Amy has proven herself and gets an invitation to join the Ring of Fire tour, leaving Ty to figure out what to do with himself before heading to university.

title: Homecoming
synopsis: In the season opener, Jack is waiting for the family to come home to Heartland, Lou is still in Dubai and Caleb and Ashley are out on the circuit. Amy has just returned home from the Ring of Fire tour and is awaiting a visit from Ty whose guest with him unsettles Amy.

title: What Dreams May Become
synopsis: Amy is looking into problems with Nick Harwell's polo pony, Dusty, and the rest of the horses appear to be getting sick, too, so Ty and Scott are called in. But Nick doesn't get to make the final call about care for the animals. And Lou comes back to Heartland from Dubai for a visit and is disappointed by the lack of care and attention the dude ranch has received since she left.

title: Road Curves
synopsis: Chase, Amy's rival from the Ring of Fire tour, shows up at Heartland and insists that Amy put on a show with him. She refuses, but Chase puts up fliers advertising the show anyway, forcing Amy to go along with his plan. And Lou has decided to extend her stay at the ranch and she's doing everything she can to avoid calls from Peter in Dubai.

title: Graduation
synopsis: It's finally time for Amy to graduate from high school and she finds out she's been offered a full scholarship to a top university's equine program. But her life seems a little off kilter and she doesn't know what to do. Lou is pushing for the full ride she's been offered, but Amy finds it hard to accept that she's graduating without her mother present.

title: Where the Truth Lies
synopsis: The town hermit, Sarah "Crazy" Craven, needs someone to take a look at her old horse, so she agrees to bring the aging animal to Heartland so Amy and Ty can work their magic, and the family helps Sarah face the ghosts in her past. Meanwhile Mallory and Badger head to the Craven place to look after the rest of the animals and get trapped.

title: Win, Place or Show
synopsis: Tim decides not to enter his horse in a big stakes race, so his girlfriend, Janice, agrees to ride another horse in the race. Unfortunately, Dan, the owner, is also Lisa's ex.

title: Jackpot!
synopsis: Looking to raise some money for a down-payment, Caleb decides to enter a team roping competition with a good-sized jackpot. But Amy gets upset when Caleb asks Kit to join the team.

title: One Day
synopsis: When Amy is hired to do a horse clinic with a group of prisoners as part of their work program, Ty is surprised to discover among the inmates an old friend from his days in the group home who helped him avoid hard time. And as Badger's summer at Heartland nears its end, he has to see where his relationship with Mallory is heading.

title: Local Hero
synopsis: While out in the woods, Ty and Amy find a calf that leads them to the cattle that was stolen from Tim, and he convinces the family to take the law into their own hands and bring the herd back. As they head for home, the ranchers come face to face with the rustlers who shot Tim the last time they met. And Mallory may have to pay the price for tagging along on the outing.

title: Mood Swings
synopsis: Grant and Blair return to Heartland so Grant can get even with Ty for kissing Blair. When Amy finds out about the incident, she decides that there's only one thing she can do -- break up with Ty. So Ty packs his bags and leaves Heartland, moving in with Caleb and Ashley. But their relationship seems a little rocky since they discovered they aren't legally married.

title: Family Business
synopsis: Still reeling from her breakup with Ty, Amy discovers that Tim is putting his horse, Lightning Dexter, up for sale in a claiming race. But she wants to keep the animal in the family. Ty is having his own struggles as he ignores his schoolwork and teams up with Caleb to hustle players at a pool hall. And Peter returns to Heartland to be near while Lou is pregnant.

title: Lost Song
synopsis: The whole family pitches in to help Lou clean out her mother's old room so it can be turned into a nursery for the baby. While rummaging through the closet, a guitar that belonged to Jack's late wife is found along with an unfinished song, bringing up some bittersweet memories. And one of Tim's old cowboy trophies is hidden in there, as well.

title: The Road Home
synopsis: When Amy returns the last of Ty's belongings, it becomes clear that he's having trouble finding his new place in the world. He's skipping classes and leaving Scott in a lurch, so Jack proposes a little road trip to help Ty get himself together. And Amy ends up overcommitted when she agrees to work with three police horses, so she asks Chase to help her out.

title: Leap of Faith
synopsis: Stewart Forrest, an Olympic trainer and one of Amy's old associates, asks her to help his daughter reign in her elite jumper. She accepts the job, but Amy quickly realizes the horse is too much for the girl to handle and an accident is inevitable. And Jack tries to persuade Mallory to return to Heartland so she can spend more time with her horse, Copper.

title: The River
synopsis: Amy is trying to keep it together and remain professional as she fights a lawsuit brought by Stewart Forrest after his daughter's accident. And everyone at Heartland is supporting Amy, even when their clients take their horses to a different ranch. But the bad publicity is starting to get to her. So she heads out on a trail ride to get some space.

title: Never Surrender
synopsis: Bryce, Caleb's old friend from the rodeo, has returned from Afghanistan in a wheelchair and he wants to hire Amy to get his horse back in shape so he can sell it for top dollar. But Amy sees this as an opportunity to help horse and rider regain their spirit. And when she agrees to be Marnie's labor coach, Lou starts to wonder if motherhood is really what she's cut out to do.

title: Burning Down the House
synopsis: A boy named Shane and his mother come to Heartland and he proves that he has a vast love for horses, but his mom is one of Tim's old girlfriends and she's got a secret that could change everything for Tim and the entire family. And Ashley has finally returned home, but she's decided to pack up and move so she can go to school, leaving Caleb unsure about whether to join her.

title: Passages
synopsis: Tim is still trying to come to terms with his newfound son, Shane, and despite his instincts, he finds he's starting to bond with the boy. And Amy and Ty are still working through their issues and trying to rebuild their trust when they're asked to train a pair of Clydesdales, but an emergency at home proves that they can rely on each other when it matters most.

title: Finding Freedom
synopsis: Amy is inspired to take her horsemanship to a new level when she works with a professional liberty horse trainer. She realizes she has to return to her roots when it comes to her work with horses and her relationship with Ty. Meanwhile, a leaky roof causes Ty to make a big decision that he thinks will help them grow as a couple. But Amy is very apprehensive; she isn't so sure Ty has made the best choice for their future. Tim is having no luck tracking down Miranda and Shane since she dropped the bombshell that Shane is his son... until Shane surprises everyone by just showing up at Heartland. On his own. And Mallory entertains the idea of going with the recently-single-again Jake to the Spring Fling. But only if it's on "her terms".

title: Something In The Night
synopsis: When Tim is coerced to go with Jack on a secret mission Amy is left back at Heartland with Janice to get a young racehorse ready for his maiden run. Unfortunately, Amy and Janice butt heads over their opposing methods for training the young racehorse. On the road, Jack forces Tim to talk to Miranda and learns why she doesn't want Shane to have anything to do with Tim, or Heartland for that matter. Meanwhile, a cute but chaotic gang of furry four-legged troublemakers foils Ty's big plans for a special dinner date with Amy. In the midst of all of this, Mallory is down on love.

title: What's In The Name?
synopsis: When Tim reveals to the family that Shane is his son it throws everybody for a loop and threatens to ruin the traditional Bartlett-Fleming naming ceremony for Lou's baby. Amy and Lou must deal with the life-changing news that they have a brother, and Shane tries to accept the father, two sisters and baby niece he never knew he had. In the midst of this major revelation Lou also has to contend with her standoffish mother-in-law's first visit to Heartland. Meanwhile, Jack and Lou's father-in-law tackle a messy home repair job that threatens to cancel the baby's naming ceremony. And Mallory feels that Shane is jeopardizing her place in the family.

title: Beyond Hell's Half Mile
synopsis: When Amy works with a chuck wagon horse she discovers an impediment that could put the entire team in danger and change the dynamics of a prominent chuck wagon family. Meanwhile, everybody at Heartland deals with sleep deprivation as Lou and Peter desperately try to get their baby to sleep at night. Mallory thinks she's found a solution, but her sleep training method ends up pitting Lou and Peter against each other. And Caleb surprises Ty when he returns home to the trailer from the West Coast... without Ashley.

title: Never Let Go
synopsis: Amy helps to restore the confidence of a troubled, young trick-rider so that she can get back on her horse and perform again. Meanwhile, Ty and Amy's plans to raise the spirits of a freshly separated Caleb with a night out on the town go completely awry. And Jack is so fed up with the full house at Heartland, along with the line-ups for the bathroom, that he decides to build an outhouse. Peter gets Jack's hint and comes up with an interesting housing idea for Lou.

title: The Slippery Slope
synopsis: A friend from Jack's past shows up at Heartland when one of their old band mates passes away. Lou and Lisa secretly try to gather the other remaining members for a reunion performance to celebrate Jack's birthday. Meanwhile, Amy works with a horse that won't stop bucking as Caleb becomes smitten with Kelly - the horse's sassy and attractive owner. And Mallory meets a young country singer wannabe who seems like her perfect match... except for the fact that he idolizes her dad.

title: Over the Rise
synopsis: When Shane arrives to stay for the summer, Tim tries to impress all three of his kids with a "really cool" Western day trip. Meanwhile, a rodeo friend of Caleb's has a unique, and somewhat crazy, request for Ty to supercharge his "ride". And Mallory is devastated when she learns that Lou may not trust her with baby Katie as much as Mallory thought she did.

title: Nothing for Granted
synopsis: When Ty visits Mrs. Bell to thank her for paying his school fees he and Amy are surprised to learn she's moved out of her home, and away from Sugarfoot. Meanwhile, Shane competes with Janice for Tim's attention and ends up finding another cowboy to look up to. Mallory starts to fall for Austin, but can't help wondering if he has an ulterior motive for getting close to her. And Soraya takes some life advice from an unlikely source... Caleb!

title: Cover Me
synopsis: When Tim's young racehorse Cisco is stolen on the way to his maiden race, Amy and Ty get help tracking him down from an unlikely source -- Ty's step-father, Wade. Meanwhile, when Lou goes off to work, Peter is left to take care of baby Katie and ends up guarding a secret that could break Lou's heart. And Caleb finally convinces Kelly to go out with him, only to have a serious curve-ball thrown his way as he arrives for their date.

title: Trust
synopsis: When Amy bravely tries to heal an abused (and now extremely violent) racehorse Ty and Jack think she's finally bitten off more than she can chew. Meanwhile, Miranda shows up to bring Shane home early when she learns what her son's been up to on his summer vacation with Tim. Peter and Lou are at odds with Lisa over their plans to start building their home near the Dude Ranch. And Jack has his own issues with Lisa to deal with when he finds out she's been spending time with her ex-husband, Dan.

title: Fool's Gold
synopsis: Ty's mother Lily returns to Heartland with shocking news about his father, and a secret that threatens her relationship with her son. Meanwhile, Amy continues to work with Alcatraz and enlists Lily's help to get the horse to trust people again. And when Lou finds herself without a babysitter, she is forced to take an important client meeting at Heartland.

title: Road to Nowhere
synopsis: When Jack learns Ty is riding his bike solo to a remote lake to spread his father's ashes he decides to surprise Ty and join him for this meaningful road trip. Amy is hurt by Ty's decision to make the trip without her.

title: Aftermath
synopsis: In an attempt to avoid hitting a wolf, Ty is badly injured when he crashes his bike on a remote road leaving Jack to search for help in the middle of nowhere. Meanwhile, back at Heartland, an anxious Amy has visions that tell her something has happened to Ty. When his lawyer digs up some dirt on Miranda, Tim starts thinking seriously about a custody suit. And Lou and Peter both receive interesting career opportunities that complicate their parenting plan.

title: Working On A Dream
synopsis: Amy is roped into helping Tim project a positive image to the community, in hopes it will further his custody case for Shane. Meanwhile, Ty works to restore his bike, and his shaken confidence, so he can get back on the road. Lou and Lisa come to a crossroads in their business partnership when construction finally begins on Lou and Peter's dream home at the Dude Ranch... during peak season! And Caleb returns from Vancouver with his and Ashley's future finally settled.

title: Breaking Down and Building Up
synopsis: When tragedy strikes Amy must find a way to save Mr. Hanley's rescue horses from kill buyers. Meanwhile, Tim makes an impulsive decision that he thinks will grant him custody of Shane. Lou and Peter can't find a house that stacks up to Lou's incredibly high standards. But in true Lou fashion she unwittingly finds herself in a bidding war with Mrs. Bell and Mallory is caught right in the middle.

title: Wild Horses
synopsis: Amy and Ty join Scott on a trip back to his old reservation to save a herd of wild horses from the dangerous EHV-1 virus. While there, Scott must deal with some unfinished business from his past. Meanwhile, Mallory's plans for the perfect sweet sixteen party are interrupted by some life-changing news. And Tim's tumultuous custody battle for Shane and recent break up with Janice send him down a dark and familiar path.

title: True Calling
synopsis: When Amy's dog Lobo is injured by a trigger-happy rancher, it's up to Ty to save his life. Meanwhile, Mallory hatches a wild plan to avoid the move to Nashville. And Jack convinces Miranda to return to Heartland to deal with Tim's increasingly erratic behaviour.

title: Candles in the Wind
synopsis: When a mystery horse arrives at Heartland, Amy and Ty are sent down a path that will alter their lives. Meanwhile, Tim and Miranda realize they have to take their son's wishes into consideration, so they decide to spend some quality time together with surprising results. Peter drives Lou crazy when he takes over the plans for their second anniversary celebration but she is almost speechless when he reveals his surprise.

title: Running Against the Wind
synopsis: Amy is bursting to ask Ty about the engagement ring, and why he hasn't proposed yet, but a couple of "runaways" throw everything at Heartland into turmoil. One of the "runaways" is a horse that likes to jump fences; Amy is trying to find the owner but she grows attached and gives the horse a name: Phoenix Rising. The other "runaway" is an eleven-year-old girl whose name is Georgina, but who wants to be called Georgie.

title: Crossed Signals
synopsis: Ty struggles to deal with the fact that Amy has found the engagement ring and has to decide how and whether he is going to propose to her or not. Kendra, who is Phoenix's owner, comes to Heartland to take him home with her. So Amy discovers that Phoenix's real name is Sky's The Limit and that Kendra, although she loves her horses, has problems taking proper care of them. Meanwhile Georgie, the 11-year-old runaway, is proving to be quite a handful.

title: Keeping Up Appearances
synopsis: Tim hopes for a big commission when he helps a wealthy weekend cowboy look for his dream ranch, while Amyâ€™s stuck teaching his trophy wife how to ride.

title: The Natural
synopsis: Amy tries to fulfill Mallory's dream of being a show jumper but discovers that it's Georgie who has the natural talent.

title: Trial Run
synopsis: Janice brings Cisco Kid (and her emotional baggage over Tim) to Heartland for Amy to figure out why Ciscoâ€™s lost that winning feeling. Georgie discovers a stray dog, and with Mallory's help, they try to rescue her from a well.

title: Helping Hands
synopsis: Amy seeks out an up-and-coming show jumper, Jeremy Hughes, to learn why he's refusing Scott and Ty's suggested treatment for his horse Buckingham.

title: Life is a Highway
synopsis: Chase Powers returns to Heartland with his wife, Hayley, who is an aspiring liberty horse rider. She wants Amy to be her coach. In the meantime Lou makes some hard decisions about her job.

title: Do The Right Thing
synopsis: When Ty needs some engine parts for his broken-down truck he's forced to turn to the last person on earth he wants help from- his stepfather Wade. In the meantime Lou tries to win Dan (Lisa's ex-husband) over as a client and Georgie has to work with Mallory in order to prepare a party for Ty.

title: Great Expectations
synopsis: Jack has applied to become Georgie's long term foster parent, so Clint interviews both of them, but things don't look well. Ty and Amy end up having a life changing weekend.

title: The Road Ahead
synopsis: A fire destroys Lou and Peter's home and puts the lives of Georgie and Phoenix at risk. Ty and Amy end up putting their good news about their engagement on hold. Amy helps Georgie when she has problems with a still spooked Phoenix. Clint has bad news for Jack, so both Tim and Lou try to help

title: Blowing Smoke
synopsis: Amy must make a hard decision about Phoenix when Jeremy's horse, Buckingham, gets hurt, which puts his jumping career in jeopardy.

title: Playing With Fire
synopsis: Lou hosts a horse show at Heartland while dealing with her problems with Peter. Both Mallory and Georgie are training for the showjumping. Mallory's coach is Jeremy and she will ride Spartan, while Georgie will ride Phoenix and is being coached by Amy.

title: Waiting For Tomorrow
synopsis: One of Spartan's back legs is broken and Amy must face one of the toughest decisions she's ever had to make. While Amy is deciding what to do, Tim and Jack are focusing on how they are going to make up the money for the vet bill. Meanwhile, both Mallory and Georgie are suffering from the events at the horse show, both in very different ways.

title: Lost and Gone Forever
synopsis: Ty's future as a vet is in jeopardy when there's a fatality at Scott's clinic. Lou has to deal with an overeager Caleb while she has to convince Georgie to play her new recorder for her music class.

title: After All We've Been Through
synopsis: In an effort to prove Jeremy was responsible for Buckingham's death, Ty searches for evidence. Meanwhile Amy works with Spartan that has finally come back home but refuses to leave the barn. Lou and Peter's romantic weekend is interrupted by Eden, Peter's ex-wife. Mallory tries to find Jack a date, since Lisa is in France and they have decided to put their relationship on hold.

title: Born to Buck
synopsis: Amy is having trouble dealing with a roping horse that only wants to buck and Caleb, who isn't sure he wants to ride broncs anymore. Shane and Miranda are back in Hudson. Lou and Amy find out that Miranda and Tim have been in a relationship for months. In the meantime Jack is offered a career opportunity and he needs to decide if he wants to take it.

title: Breaking Point
synopsis: Amy and Lou help Georgie regain her confidence as a showjumper when Olivia makes her question her place in the family. In the meantime, there is a possibility of losing Phoenix after Eric Williams (who has bought both the farm where Phoenix used to live and its livestock) sees his natural potential as a jumper. And unfortunately Amy doesn't have the papers to prove she's Phoenix's new owner.

title: Under Pressure
synopsis: With the threat of losing Phoenix to Eric looming over their heads, things become even more complicated at Heartland when Georgie gets a surprise visit from her brother Jeff. When Jeff reveals the real reason for his visit the family is faced with the possibility of losing Georgie as well. With all the drama at home, Amy has second thoughts about going on a road trip to Las Vegas with Ty. Meanwhile, Peter suggests a life-changing idea to Lou that she finds impossible to wrap her head around and an increasingly stressed out and overworked Jack ends his partnership with Tim - for good.

title: Picking Up the Pieces
synopsis: Jack returns from his trip to Arizona to find that Tim has made drastic changes to Heartland. Amy works with a horse whose owner turns out to be a prince, and Georgie struggles to ask Peter if he will take her to a father-daughter dance at her school.

title: Living in the Moment
synopsis: Lou pressures Jack into going to the doctor after a scary accident, and Amy and Ty discuss buying a ranch together. Georgie gets fed up with Olivia picking on her and throws a punch, leading to her to be grounded by Peter, and almost missing the Spring Classic.

title: Wrecking Ball
synopsis: Amy and Georgie find a dead horse, which leads Scott and Ty on a mission to discover why it died and to learn if other horses could be in peril. At the same time, Lou and Tim find themselves on opposite ends of a fight when Tim attempts to rebrand Maggie's into a soulless fast food franchise.

title: The Penny Drops
synopsis: As Amy and Ty help a mare and foal through a difficult weaning process, Jake and Mallory share an emotional goodbye as he leaves for Paris, and she struggles to decide if she will stay working as a manager at Maggie's or join Jake in Paris.

title: Thread the Needle
synopsis: Amy attempts to help a young Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) constable overcome a personal challenge to fulfill his lifelong dream of performing in the RCMP Musical Ride.

title: Now or Never
synopsis: Georgie is enthralled when she sees one of Amy's clients trick riding, and she's determined to pursue it despite Lou's misgivings. Georgie's brother bonds with her.

title: Best Man
synopsis: When an old friend turns to him for help, Ty is torn between his ties to the past and his loyalties to his family at Heartland. Caleb returns and so does Nicole.

title: Hotshot
synopsis: Lou is determined to have a perfect family vacation, but it doesn't go as planned when Peter's job interferes. Meanwhile, Jack and Georgie visit the fishing cabin to find Tim and his new 'friend' and her trouble making daughter staying there.

title: There But for Fortune
synopsis: Amy's success working with a high-end show jumper puts her life in jeopardy. Lou gets a book offer for her blog.

title: Darkness and Light
synopsis: Family members are pitted against each other over Amy's medical treatment as she struggles to come to terms with her injuries and uncertain future. Ashley tries to get back together with Caleb, but he finds out she was using him to tell whether or not she should marry her new boyfriend.

title: Better Days
synopsis: Ty forces Amy to confront her fear and work with the horse that injured her in order to save its life. Lou leaves for her book tour and Peter takes things over.

title: Walking Tall
synopsis: When Ty brings a maltreated Tennessee Walker to Heartland to convalesce, Amy goes undercover to bring its abusers to justice.

title: Lost Highway
synopsis: Amy works with a horse to help it overcome its fear of water, but sparks fly when Jack learns the horse is owned by a former flame. Peter and Katie go join Lou on her book tour.

title: Things We Lost
synopsis: When a road trip goes awry, Jack and Lisa find themselves lost in the woods, but a trip down memory lane may help them find their way together.

title: Smoke 'n' Mirrors
synopsis: When Tim goes through a mid-life crisis and buys a hot horse instead of the more traditional hot car, Amy does some dad whispering to help him come to his senses. Georgie gets better and better at trick riding.

title: The Comeback Kid
synopsis: Lou returns home after her book tour was a failure. Amy's client list has dwindled since her accident, so Lou convinces her to hold a "comeback" clinic. Ty and Caleb invest in a barrel racing horse.

title: On the Line
synopsis: Amy and Ty are at odds over Ty's risky investment in a barrel racing horse, and Amy starts working closely with Prince Ahmed. Tim made improvements to the diner, but Lou is reluctant.

title: Be Careful What You Wish For
synopsis: Amy works with Ty and Caleb's barrel racing horse and rides him in a high-stakes Futurity.

title: There and Back Again
synopsis: Amy returns from Europe but finds herself struggling to integrate back into life at Heartland and her relationship with Ty.

title: The Big Red Wall
synopsis: Ty gets caught in the middle of Amy's and Caleb's disagreement over training a horse. Georgie is still upset over what she found on the internet and gives Amy the cold shoulder. Georgie finds an online animal sanctuary that she wants to donate to, but finds out that things on the internet aren't always what they seem.

title: Severed Ties
synopsis: Gifts from Ahmed hamper Amy's chances of reuniting with Georgie. Jack and Tim compete in a charity roping event. Peter and Lou are at odds over where to send Katie for pre-school. Ty considers a different career choice.

title: Secrets and Lies
synopsis: Prince Ahmed visits Amy at Heartland and declares he loves her, but Amy tells him they'll only ever be friends. Tim, out of loop as usual, invites Ahmed to Heartland for dinner that ends in a fight between Ty and Ahmed after Georgie reveals that the Prince is in love with Amy.

title: Endings and Beginnings
synopsis: Amy works with a pair of Liberty horses but struggles because of her "break" with Ty. Ty finds a dead bear with it's gallbladder missing - a sign of poachers - on the Wildlife Reserve where he now works. Georgie cares for an orphaned wolf pup, and Lou hires Jade to work at the Dude ranch with disastrous results.

title: Steal Away
synopsis: Jade - the reluctant new ranch hand - and Georgie are blamed when a client horse escapes from his stall, but they find out this horse has a hidden talent. Ty recruits Scott to help him take down a poaching ring.

title: Walk a Mile
synopsis: Amy struggles to help a Hutterite family whose team of Percherons ran amok during a hayride.

title: The Family Tree
synopsis: Georgie's school project puts her into contact with her only living relative which could alter her life at Heartland. Amy is recruited by Caleb to train a bulldogging horse he wants to sell to Casey. Ty breaks the news to Caleb that he wants out of their business partnership.

title: The Pike River Cull
synopsis: News of a cull sends Jack and Amy to Pike River to help out Will Vernon. Tim sees this as an opportunity to get Ty and Amy working together again, so he tricks Ty in coming with him. Lou and Peter's marriage becomes strained when Lou finds out Peter's flight home wasn't cancelled and he almost misses their family stay-cation.

title: The Heart of a River
synopsis: With the wild horses in jeopardy of being removed from their home, Amy and Ty hatch a plan to save them from the meat truck and ultimately reconnect with each other. Back at Heartland, Lou and Peter are under investigation from the Child Protection Society.

title: The Silent Partner
synopsis: Amy unexpectedly finds out that Peter declined a lucrative job offer that would've moved his work closer to home. Georgie, overwhelmed with all she has to do, asks her friend to help exercise Phoenix. Ty finds out Caleb partnered with Jesse Stanton, and Caleb is going around town kissing Jesse's girlfriend.

title: Broken Heartland
synopsis: Ty and Amy decide to have a weekend alone in Montana when they find a hitchhiker. Back at the ranch, Lou confronts Peter about the job offer and why he turned it down. Meanwhile, Georgie volunteers at the vet clinic.

title: Cowgirls Don't Cry
synopsis: Ty's and Amy's 'save the date' bounces from Wade and Lily. So Amy and Ty go to see Wade for some answers. Meanwhile, Georgie looks forward to the dance with Steven.

title: Riders on the Storm
synopsis: Amy and Ty help Scott's nephew realize he is worthy of continuing his family tradition of relay racing. Meanwhile, Georgie is caught in the middle when her brother Jeff and her friend Jade exchange half-truths and outright lies in order to impress each other. And Tim initially refuses Jack's offer to help with the rodeo school, but is later forced to swallow his pride and accept what Jack can bring to the table.

title: Eclipse of the Heart
synopsis: Lou returns from Vancouver with an admission that threatens to change the Heartland family forever. Meanwhile, Jack intervenes when he discovers that Tim intends to crash Miranda's wedding in Moose Jaw. Then, when Amy helps Caleb source a horse for Tim's rodeo school she learns just how precarious Caleb's business partnership is with Jesse. And Georgie fights disappointment when it looks like Peter won't make it home to take in the lunar eclipse with her, as promised.

title: Faking It
synopsis: The family strives to support a devastated Georgie when Lou and Peter are forced to tell her about their separation, and Amy helps Georgie find the strength and determination she needs to deal with the terrible news while training for an upcoming trick riding competition. Meanwhile, Ty jumps to Caleb's defense when Jesse calls in Caleb's loan, effectively ruining him.

title: All I Need is You
synopsis: Lou spearheads preparations for the big day while Amy throws herself into gentling a rescue horse in order to avoid all the wedding craziness. But Amy and Ty's happy future is jeopardized when Ty is unexpectedly arrested for assault. Meanwhile, Georgie observes an intimate moment between Lou and Peter and nurtures hope that they are getting back together. And Tim risks telling Casey how he feels about her, and then obsesses over her response.

title: Written in Stone
synopsis: In order to give Amy and Ty the wedding they really want, Lou struggles to deal with a slew of last minute hurdles.

title: Brave New World
synopsis: Ty and Amy are back from their honeymoon and Georgie is trying to be able to handle what is going on with Lou and Peter. Ty and Amy are adding on to the loft. Amy and Georgie find a hurt horse.

title: Begin Again
synopsis: Ty celebrates graduating as he and Amy diagnose a difficult patient. Lou struggles with being a good parent through the separation and impending divorce from Peter.

title: Riding for a Fall
synopsis: After enlisting Amy to help her perfect a trick to perform at an upcoming rodeo, Georgie gets pulled away by Lou and Peter who insist she focus on her schoolwork.

title: Ties of the Earth
synopsis: Everyone rallies around Jack as he struggles with the inevitable loss of a friend. Georgie gets some unwanted help with her schoolwork.

title: Back in the Saddle
synopsis: Jack is having a hard time since Paint died. Amy and Georgie take part in Casey's rodeo. Georgie is trying to Jack to ride Buddy.But he doesn't want another horse. But jack decides to give Buddy a shot.

title: Over and Out
synopsis: Ty and Amy get stuck up the mountains on a rescue mission with a wounded animal.

title: Fearless
synopsis: Amy helps a Medieval jouster who was badly injured during a competition regain his confidence so he can compete again.

title: Reckless Abandon
synopsis: Georgie prepares to say goodbye to Bear as he goes off to train with the Mounted Police; Lou gets a chance at a first date, and Tim might be in for a big life change.

title: A Matter of Trust
synopsis: Amy and Ty work together to determine why Caleb's horse becomes ill during his treatment at Heartland.

title: Darkness Before Dawn
synopsis: Georgie begins to second-guess her decision to run away from Heartland, while the family bands together to find her.

title: Making the Grade
synopsis: Ty gets roped into helping Jack and Tim on a cattle drive but an unforeseen accident jeopardizes their plans.

title: The Real Deal
synopsis: When Jade thinks about accepting a shady sponsorship deal, Tim asks for Amy and Georgie's help to talk her out of it.

title: Risky Business
synopsis: Amy teams up with Cass to find a solution when Janice asks for Amy's help with her racehorse. The return of Janice forces Tim to reevaluate his current relationship.

title: No Regrets
synopsis: Georgie's school project on Val Stanton inspires her to take a risk with Adam.

title: Making a Move
synopsis: Lou's return from New York does not go smoothly when she must deal with two new additions to her world. Firstly, the food truck parked across the street from Maggie's and secondly, the hot new Heartland ranch hand no one told her about.

title: Pandora's Box
synopsis: Lou and Mitch, the ranch hand, share their pasts while trapped at the Dude ranch; Georgie and Adam "need to talk."

title: Love Is Just a Word
synopsis: While trying to help Cass learn to handle a spirited horse, Amy discovers there is more riding on their success than she initially realized.

title: Resolutions
synopsis: When their plans to get away are thwarted, Amy and Ty celebrate their first anniversary closer to home and Amy unveils a special surprise.

title: Wildfire: Series Premiere
synopsis: Kris Furillo is a young girl with a troubled past who gets a second chance luckily when she goes to work at a horse farm, but being an outsider in a high-stakes world is not easy.

title: The Rescue
synopsis: Kris's only friend is a horse named Wildfire, and when he is threatened she makes a decision that will affect both their lives forever.

title: Trust
synopsis: Kris returns to Raintree Ranch after ninety days at Camp Lagrange and begins the healing process.

title: Mothers
synopsis: Kris's mother Barb pays an unexpected visit to Raintree.

title: Guilty
synopsis: Kris feels responsible when Oklahoma Crude is injured during a work out race with Wildfire so she gets a job at a local diner to help out, although it might not be enough.

title: The Claiming Race
synopsis: Against the backdrop of a high-stakes horse race, Kris falls for Junior.

title: Lost & Found
synopsis: Kris and her companions track lost horses in the woods while the Ritter family grows emotionally.

title: The Track
synopsis: Kris invetigates the seamy underworld of the race track after Wildfire comes down with colic.

title: The Party
synopsis: Kris makes an unexpected but crucial discovery about her past when an old friend arrives.

title: Identity
synopsis: When she gets thrown off a horse and injured, Kris herself realizes that a career as a jockey might come at a high price.

title: Tina Sharp
synopsis: Kris turns to painkillers to cope with her injury when the possibility of riding in an upcoming race is contingent upon her getting better.

title: Impressions
synopsis: Kris and Junior are getting more serious as Junior invites Kris to have dinner with the Davis's.

title: Loyalty
synopsis: Kris is hired to ride Wildfire although she struggles to remain focused because of her relationship with Junior.

title: Try it Without the Porsche
synopsis: Kris meets Kerry Connelly, a sports agent who takes interest in Kris after the results of the Sandpiper Race.

title: Opportunity Knocks
synopsis: On the heels of her dramatic second place finish in the Sandpiper Race, Kris is offered an opportunity to star in a commercial with Wildfire, which unexpectedly thrusts Kris and Junior together.

title: A Good Convict Is Hard to Find
synopsis: Kris reluctantly returns to Camp LaGrange for an event at the Equestrian Center where she first met Wildfire.

title: Dangerous Liaisons
synopsis: Kris is left alone in charge of Raintree when Jean goes on a trip with Charlie, Matt goes with Dani to help her look into a new racehorse, and Pablo investigates a mysterious phone call.

title: Family Matters
synopsis: With Pablo away, Matt trains Kris for her first turf race on Wildfire while simultaneously secretly training Wildfire's competition -- Dani's horse Picaro.

title: Nothing Takes the Past Away Like the Future
synopsis: When Raintree takes on a well-known horse to train, Kris and Matt work together to figure out the horse's problem, only to discover the real reason Pablo wants nothing to do with it.

title: Taking Off
synopsis: Kris learns a lesson in the jockey life as she works under a renowned but demanding trainer.

title: Fear
synopsis: Kris must turn to Junior for help when she is asked to throw a race by John Zack, the figure from Pablo's past.

title: Break Down
synopsis: Kris finds herself racing Dani's horse Picaro against Wildfire, as the result of a promise she made.

Kris deals with a crisis of confidence after the events of the pile-up, as Junior and Dani find out startling news about their father and Matt struggles with revealing information regarding the cause of the pile-up with Kris.

title: Who Are You?
synopsis: Kris must woo an influential heiress in hopes of getting Wildfire, and not Dani's horse Ishmael, selected for the Breeders Invitational Stakes.

title: For Love Or Money?
synopsis: Kris must choose between an opportunity to win a spot in the Breeders Invitational Stakes and caring for an in-labor Belladonna.

title: Close Shave
synopsis: Kris is reunited with Wildfire in time to race on the world's biggest stage, in the Breeders Invitational Stakes.

title: Fairy Tale Endings
synopsis: Kris learns what happened to Kerry while Raintree deals with the unexpected fallout of the Breeders' Cup win.

title: The Feud
synopsis: Kris resorts to desperate measures to ease Raintree's financial crisis.

title: Moving On
synopsis: Kris has a falling out with Jean over Wildfire's readiness to race again.

title: Close to Home
synopsis: The destruction of Kris's trailer by fire forces her to move into the Ritters' house, which brings her closer to an old flame.

title: Love vs. Work
synopsis: Kris is distracted by the return of her rival, Tina Sharp (Amy Jo Johnson), who is tapped to ride a Raintree boarder's horse that used to belong to the Davis ranch.

title: Kiss, Kiss
synopsis: Kris is overcome by emotion when she helps Matt and Junior try to save Flame from being sold by Junior's dad.

title: Push Me, Pull You
synopsis: Kris worries about her status at Raintree after Gillian moves into the bunkhouse with Matt and begins offering unsolicited advice about Wildfire's training.

title: The Goodbye
synopsis: With Raintree in dire financial straits, Jean and Matt's willingness to consider a buyer's offer draws criticism from Pablo and Kris.

title: Heartless
synopsis: Kris increasingly becomes the object of Matt's affection; this renders his relationship with Gillian incompatible.

title: Diplomacy
synopsis: Kris and Matt's rekindled relationship comes as a shock to Junior, who is distracted by consoling Dani in her time of mourning.

title: You Can't Count on Me
synopsis: Kris' endeavors to get accustomed to her new relationship with Matt and deal with Pablo's departure are interrupted by a surprise visit from her half brother (Ignacio Serricchio).

title: Picking Sides
synopsis: Kris tries to repair the rift between Matt and Junior, but the tension is exacerbated by the approach of the important Bristol Stakes and the return of Gillian, who proceeds to resume her bonding with Junior.

title: So Long, Pardner
synopsis: Kris and Matt weigh a generous offer from Sheik Omar that would go a long way toward easing Raintree's financial woes--but that also may be against the law.

title: The More Things Change: Part I
synopsis: Six months after Kris was forced out, Raintree has undergone significant operational changes that leave Matt pining for the past.

title: The More Things Change: Part II
synopsis: After Kris unexpectedly returns for a glimpse of Wildfire's next race, she gains an unlikely ally and a place to stay.

title: Calm
synopsis: Jean and Pablo are adamant that Kris leave town instead of sticking around and helping to care for Wildfire.

title: Flames
synopsis: Kris and Junior help Matt with his improbable plan to get Raintree back in the horse-racing business, which involves finding Wildfire's offspring, Flame.

title: The Friend
synopsis: Junior's preoccupation with his and Calvin's business proposition takes time away from his wedding plans, but Laura suspects his loss of focus may have something to do with Kris.

title: Friendship/Passion
synopsis: The pressure is on Junior to decide whether or not to go through with his wedding to Laura after he and Kris share a moment of passion.

title: Commitment Issues
synopsis: When it appears that Flame is ready for his first race, Kris decides to fight to get her jockey's license reinstated.

title: Life's Too Short
synopsis: Kris hopes that Flame's success in the DuPont Stakes might help Jean change her mind about Raintree's future, but Kris isn't so sure about what part---if any---she'll play in it.

title: Vows
synopsis: Kris and Junior hastily decide to get married, but they're forced to postpone their plans when Jean is injured by one of the horses rescued by Matt.

title: The Comeback
synopsis: With Jean still out of commission, Kris and Matt do their best to run the dude ranch at Raintree while also preparing for the next race, which features Dani's new horse in the field.

title: Being Mrs. Junior
